title: Unable to login to League today, even though i was playing yesterday
body:
I couldn't login to league today, and did everything that was on the webpage that told me to do.
I also installed the hextech repair tool, tried that.
I even uninstalled regularly, and also did a clean uninstall, I did the DNS thing on there too, I tried everything, and still cant login.
I even tried to login to the PBE and I keep getting this error, "Unable to connect to the authentication service. Check the server status here, if it looks good, follow the guide here" I did everything the guide said to do and nothing worked. :/ really was looking forward to playing league today. Someone please help!

replies.body:
If you can't get signed in through your live *or* PBE account, it's probably something oriented with your connection most likely. Sometimes certain firewalls or antivirus' can block League access to our servers, so try starting there by temporarily turning those both off and trying to login. 

If that doesn't help, double check that the ports needed for Leagues servers are open by checking out those steps on the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

I am not able to log in neither, the same issue, it just says "unable to connect to authentication server". 
I must point out that I have Mac, but I was playing normally till yesterday. 

Any help?
